import React from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; export const Contacts = () => { const serviceID = "service_ID"; const templateID = "template_ID"; const userID = ""; function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('serviceID', 'templateID', e.target, 'userID') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); } return (
